name: Space Invader (hindba)
description:
This game was created as part of Game development Course by Coursera. 

The original game was modified as follows: 

1- A tutorial level was built to begin at new game to show the player how to use the game mechanics and controls. 

2- the overall main menu theme was changed (buttons, layouts) 

3- A second level was added to the game that have the horror element were the player is required to go into scary cave to find the hidden gem. 

4- the game music was changed to add a horror element. 

5- the jump height was adjusted to give the player more freedom in exploring the place.
